popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on offensive and damaging powers
A mastery path focused on hindering and weakening foes

data.name: Ain't Done Yet!
data.description: Your healing abilities become 40% more effective when the target is below 25% hit points and Shrug It Off will make its target 25% more receptive to incoming heals.
data.rawDescription: Your healing abilities become {COM_1_VAL1}% more effective when the target is below 25% hit points and Shrug It Off will make its target 25% more receptive to incoming heals.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 1464 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Resurrects all groupmates within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for {ABIL_3884_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} over {ABIL_3884_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, and they will deal {ABIL_3876_COM_0_VAL0}% more damage for {ABIL_3876_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Big Waaagh!
data.description: Deals 309 Elemental damage.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE}.

data.name: Bigger, Better, An' Greener
data.description:
Heals your target for 883 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.
data.rawDescription:
Heals your target for {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Bleed Fer' Me
data.description: You deal 1072 Elemental damage to your target over 24 seconds and your defensive target is healed for 150% of the damage done.
data.rawDescription: You deal {ABIL_3909_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to your target over {ABIL_3909_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and your defensive target is healed for 150% of the damage done.

data.name: Brain Bursta
data.description: Deals 344 Elemental damage to your target.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to your target.

data.name: Breath of Mork
data.description: Heals your target for 501 health every 3 seconds over 9 seconds. Each pulse also heals those around the target within 30 feet.
data.rawDescription: Heals your target for {COM_1_VAL0_HEALTH} every 3 seconds over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Each pulse also heals those around the target within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}.

data.name: Bunch o' Waaagh
data.description: You concentrate on your target for up to 6 seconds, repeatedly dealing 344 Elemental damage to them as long as you maintain your concentration.
data.rawDescription: You concentrate on your target for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, repeatedly dealing {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to them as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Burst O' Waaagh!
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a spell that grants Waaagh!, an additional Waaagh! will be granted as well.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit with a spell that grants Waaagh!, an additional Waaagh! will be granted as well.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Da Waaagh! Is Coming
data.description: Deals 338 Elemental damage to your target, and will then damage another target within 20 feet of the last, damaging up to 9 different targets total. Targets can not be hit more than once by the ability.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to your target, and will then damage another target within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} of the last, damaging up to 9 different targets total. Targets can not be hit more than once by the ability.

data.name: Dat Makes Me Dizzy
data.description: Your can now resurrect allies instantly, but you are stunned for 3 seconds after casting.
data.rawDescription: Your can now resurrect allies instantly, but you are stunned for {ABIL_1908_COM_5_DURA_SECONDS} after casting.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Willpower by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.
data.rawDescription: A strong heal that will restore {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage, but all of your casted heals become {COM_1_VAL1}% less effective.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.
data.rawDescription: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} that will absorb up to {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} from melee abilities.

data.name: Do Sumfin Useful
data.description: Your target's Toughness is increased by 150 and they regain 952 health over 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Your target's Toughness is increased by {ABIL_3274_COM_6_VAL0} and they regain {COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Don' Feel Nuthin
data.note:
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
Target must be in your group or warband.

data.rawDescription: Surrounds an ally with a magical barrier that absorbs up to {COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} for up to {ABIL_3911_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Eeeek!
data.description: You blast back all enemies within 20 feet of you, knocking them back a medium distance and snaring them by 20% for 10 seconds. Monsters will be knocked down by the blast.
data.rawDescription: You blast back all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of you, knocking them back a medium distance and snaring them by {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}. Monsters will be knocked down by the blast.

data.name: 'Ere We Go!
data.description: Everyone in your group within 100 feet will do an additional 125 Elemental damage on their next attack within 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Everyone in your group within 100 feet will do an additional {COM_1_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} on their next attack within {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Ere We Goes Again
data.description: Ere We Go will now deal 150 damage, and it will now affect your allies' next 2 attacks.
data.rawDescription: Ere We Go will now deal {ABIL_1902_COM_4_VAL0_DAMAGE}, and it will now affect your allies' next 2 attacks.

data.name: Extra Special Mushrooms
data.description: Increases your chance to critically heal by 10%.
data.rawDescription: Increases your chance to critically heal by {COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.name: 'Ey, Quit Bleedin'
data.description: Heals your target for 1700 health over 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Heals your target for {ABIL_3908_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {ABIL_3908_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Feelz No Pain

data.rawDescription: Heals all of your group mates within 100 feet for {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and decreases damage against them  to {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}

data.name: Fists of Gork
data.description: Deals 1200 damage and knocks back all enemy targets within 20 feet of your target.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocks back all enemy targets within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of your target.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Fury of Da Green
data.description:
A surge of Waaagh! explodes from your target, inflicting 277 Elemental damage upon them and up to 4 other enemies within 25 feet of them, and healing your defensive target and allies within 20 feet of them for 838 health, plus 50% of the total inflicted damage.

When casting this ability, you will focus your power into ensuring a hit rather than for maximum damage, causing it to be 20% less likely to be Blocked or Disrupted.
data.rawDescription:
A surge of Waaagh! explodes from your target, inflicting {ABIL_2103_COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} upon them and up to 4 other enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them, and healing your defensive target and allies within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} of them for {ABIL_2103_COM_3_VAL0_HEALTH}, plus 50% of the total inflicted damage.

When casting this ability, you will focus your power into ensuring a hit rather than for maximum damage, causing it to be 20% less likely to be Blocked or Disrupted.

data.name: Gather Round
data.description: Heals group members within 100 feet for 643 health.
data.rawDescription: Heals group members within 100 feet for {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.

data.name: Geddoff!
data.description: Deals 205 Elemental damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them, and knocks them backwards.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to your target and all other enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them, and knocks them backwards.

data.name: Gedup!
data.description: Resurrects your target with 20% health.
data.rawDescription: Resurrects your target with 20% health.

data.name: Get Movin'!
data.description: Any time one of your groupmates damages an enemy with 'Ere We Go, they will gain 150 points of Morale.
data.rawDescription: Any time one of your groupmates damages an enemy with 'Ere We Go, they will gain {ABIL_1902_COM_2_VAL0} points of Morale.

data.name: Git Outta Here!
data.description: Reduces Eeeek!'s cooldown time by 40 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Reduces Eeeek!'s cooldown time by {COM_0_VAL0_SECONDS}.

data.name: Scrub Ya Gud!
data.description: Any time you use Greener 'N Cleaner on an ally, you will additionally remove one Curse or Ailment from all groupmates within 50 feet of them.
data.rawDescription: Any time you use Greener 'N Cleaner on an ally, you will additionally remove one Curse or Ailment from all groupmates within 50 feet of them.

data.description: Your target suffers 600 damage over 2s. If the target moves, the duration is restarted.

data.name: Gork'll Fix It
data.description: Your target regains 258 health immediately, then continues to gain another 315 health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.
data.rawDescription: Your target regains {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} immediately, then continues to gain another {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Gork's Barbs'
data.description: Gork takes interest in your target, reducing all incoming heals by 50% for 10 seconds, and will deal 332 Elemental damage to anyone healing his new toy.
data.rawDescription: Gork takes interest in your target, reducing all incoming heals by 50% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, and will deal {COM_2_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to anyone healing his new toy.

data.name: Green Cleanin'
data.description: If Greener 'N Cleaner successfully removes an effect from an ally, then they will also regain 534 health over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: If Greener 'N Cleaner successfully removes an effect from an ally, then they will also regain {ABIL_3219_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {ABIL_3219_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.note:
Target must be Cursed or Ailing
Mork's Waaagh! reduces cooldown.
Builds Gork's Waaagh!

data.name: Touch of Gork
data.description: Brain Bursta will now also reduce the victim's Toughness by 150 for 20 seconds and reduces the duration and tick interval of Bunch o' Waaagh by 50%. Gorks power however will reduce the effectiveness of your healing abilities by 20% and increases the cooldown of Bunch o' Waaagh by 50%.

Gorks power however will reduce the effectiveness of your healing abilities by {COM_2_VAL1}% and increases the cooldown of Bunch o' Waaagh by 50%.

data.name: Shrug It Off
data.description: An ally is charged with Waaagh for 30 seconds, allowing them to recover from near fatal wounds. If the allies health is reduced below 25%, this effect will immediately dispel itself to restore 711 health if they are still alive. A player may only be affected by a single Shrug it Off at a time.

A player may only be affected by a single Shrug it Off at a time.
